title: Morning Flex Queue
body:
So I've been playing flex queue in the early morning/. Placements were ok, but in the last few days games have been really unbalanced. Like bronze and diamonds in the same game unbalanced. I'm  not upset or anything but I was wondering  if this because these players are just going through their first  games in this queue or because there isn't enough players at that time of the morning (like 4-7am). 
Has anyone else had a similar experience? Have we heard anything from riot about the viability of the am queue?
